member.name: F:FineUI.Renderer.Date
member.summary: 日期（RendererArgument来指定日期格式化字符串） RendererArgument: d 月中的某一天。一位数的日期没有前导零。 dd 月中的某一天。一位数的日期有一个前导零。 ddd 周中某天的缩写名称，在 AbbreviatedDayNames 中定义。 dddd 周中某天的完整名称，在 DayNames 中定义。 M 月份数字。一位数的月份没有前导零。 MM 月份数字。一位数的月份有一个前导零。 MMM 月份的缩写名称，在 AbbreviatedMonthNames 中定义。 MMMM 月份的完整名称，在 MonthNames 中定义。 y 不包含纪元的年份。如果不包含纪元的年份小于 10，则显示不具有前导零的年份。 yy 不包含纪元的年份。如果不包含纪元的年份小于 10，则显示具有前导零的年份。 yyyy 包括纪元的四位数的年份。

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToNext
member.summary: Moves to the next sibling of the current node.
member.returns: true if the navigator is successful moving to the next sibling node, false if there are no more siblings or if the navigator is currently positioned on an attribute node. If false, the position of the navigator is unchanged.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToPrevious
member.summary: Moves to the previous sibling of the current node.
member.returns: true if the navigator is successful moving to the previous sibling node, false if there is no previous sibling or if the navigator is currently positioned on an attribute node.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToFirst
member.summary: Moves to the first sibling of the current node.
member.returns: true if the navigator is successful moving to the first sibling node, false if there is no first sibling or if the navigator is currently positioned on an attribute node.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToFirstChild
member.summary: Moves to the first child of the current node.
member.returns: true if there is a first child node, otherwise false.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToParent
member.summary: Moves to the parent of the current node.
member.returns: true if there is a parent node, otherwise false.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToRoot
member.summary: Moves to the root node to which the current node belongs.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveTo(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator)
member.summary: Moves to the same position as the specified HtmlNavigator.
member.param: The HtmlNavigator positioned on the node that you want to move to.
member.returns: true if successful, otherwise false. If false, the position of the navigator is unchanged.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToId(System.String)
member.summary: Moves to the node that has an attribute of type ID whose value matches the specified string.
member.param: A string representing the ID value of the node to which you want to move. This argument does not need to be atomized.
member.returns: true if the move was successful, otherwise false. If false, the position of the navigator is unchanged.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.IsSamePosition(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator)
member.summary: Determines whether the current HtmlNavigator is at the same position as the specified HtmlNavigator.
member.param: The HtmlNavigator that you want to compare against.
member.returns: true if the two navigators have the same position, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new HtmlNavigator positioned at the same node as this HtmlNavigator.
member.returns: A new HtmlNavigator object positioned at the same node as the original HtmlNavigator.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.GetAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the HTML attribute with the specified LocalName and NamespaceURI.
member.param: The local name of the HTML attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute. Unsupported with the HtmlNavigator implementation.
member.returns: The value of the specified HTML attribute. String.Empty or null if a matching attribute is not found or if the navigator is not positioned on an element node.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves to the HTML attribute with matching LocalName and NamespaceURI.
member.param: The local name of the HTML attribute.
The namespace URI of the attribute. Unsupported with the HtmlNavigator implementation.
member.returns: true if the HTML attribute is found, otherwise, false. If false, the position of the navigator does not change.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToFirstAttribute
member.summary: Moves to the first HTML attribute.
member.returns: true if the navigator is successful moving to the first HTML attribute, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute
member.summary: Moves to the next HTML attribute.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.GetNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the namespace node corresponding to the specified local name. Always returns string.Empty for the HtmlNavigator implementation.
member.param: The local name of the namespace node.
member.returns: Always returns string.Empty for the HtmlNavigator implementation.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Moves the XPathNavigator to the namespace node with the specified local name. Always returns false for the HtmlNavigator implementation.
member.param: The local name of the namespace node.
member.returns: Always returns false for the HtmlNavigator implementation.

member.name: M:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNodeNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope)
member.summary: Moves the XPathNavigator to the next namespace node. Always returns falsefor the HtmlNavigator implementation.
member.param: An XPathNamespaceScope value describing the namespace scope.
member.returns: Always returns false for the HtmlNavigator implementation.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceText

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd
member.summary: Defines if closing for non closed nodes must be done at the end or directly in the document. Setting this to true can actually change how browsers render the page. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionFixNestedTags
member.summary: Defines if LI, TR, TH, TD tags must be partially fixed when nesting errors are detected. Default is false.

member.name: F:HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceTextMaxLength
member.summary: Defines the maximum length of source text or parse errors. Default is 100.
